mapper.select: /* selectIssueByPrjctSn open상태의 이슈 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM, openIS.* FROM ( SELECT A.ISSUE_SN, A.ISSUE_TITLE, ( SELECT D.MILE_NO FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_NO, ( SELECT D.MILE_TITLE FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_TITLE, A.ISSUE_IPCR_SE_CODE, C.MBER_NCNM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ISSUE_REPLY WHERE ISSUE_SN = A.ISSUE_SN ) AS REPLYCNT FROM ISSUE A, PROJECT_USER B, MEMBER C WHERE A.ISSUE_WRTER = B.USER_SN AND B.MBER_SN = C.MBER_SN AND A.PRJCT_SN = #{prjct_sn} AND A.ISSUE_STTUS_CODE = '1' ORDER BY A.ISSUE_REGDATE DESC) openIS
/* selectCnt open상태의 이슈 갯수 조회 */ select count(*) from issue where prjct_sn = #{prjct_sn} and issue_sttus_code = '1'

SELECT a.issue_sn, a.unit_job_sn, a.mile_no, a.issue_wrter, a.issue_title, a.issue_content, a.issue_ipcr_se_code, a.issue_sttus_code, a.issue_regdate, a.issue_enddate, a.issue_updatedate, a.file_sn, a.prjct_sn, c.mber_ncnm, c.mber_sn FROM issue a, project_user b, member c where a.issue_wrter = b.user_sn and b.mber_sn = c.mber_sn and mile_no = #{mile_no} and issue_sttus_code = 1

SELECT a.issue_sn, a.unit_job_sn, a.mile_no, a.issue_wrter, a.issue_title, a.issue_content, a.issue_ipcr_se_code, a.issue_sttus_code, a.issue_regdate, a.issue_enddate, a.issue_updatedate, a.file_sn, a.prjct_sn, c.mber_ncnm, c.mber_sn FROM issue a, project_user b, member c where a.issue_wrter = b.user_sn and b.mber_sn = c.mber_sn and mile_no = #{mile_no} and issue_sttus_code = 0

/* selectIssueCloseByPrjctSn close상태의 이슈 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM, closeIS.* FROM ( SELECT A.ISSUE_SN, A.ISSUE_TITLE, ( SELECT D.MILE_NO FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_NO, ( SELECT D.MILE_TITLE FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_TITLE, A.ISSUE_IPCR_SE_CODE, C.MBER_NCNM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ISSUE_REPLY WHERE ISSUE_SN = A.ISSUE_SN ) AS REPLYCNT FROM ISSUE A, PROJECT_USER B, MEMBER C WHERE A.ISSUE_WRTER = B.USER_SN AND B.MBER_SN = C.MBER_SN AND A.PRJCT_SN = #{prjct_sn} AND A.ISSUE_STTUS_CODE = '0' ORDER BY A.ISSUE_REGDATE DESC) closeIS
/* selectCloseCnt close상태의 이슈 갯수 조회 */ select count(*) from issue where prjct_sn = #{prjct_sn} and issue_sttus_code = '0'
/* selectDutyCharge regist에서 단위업무 조회하기 */ select unit_job_nm, unit_job_sn from duty_charge where user_sn in (select user_sn from project_user where prjct_sn= #{prjct_sn})
mapper.insert: /* registIssue 이슈등록 */ INSERT INTO ISSUE ( ISSUE_SN, UNIT_JOB_SN, MILE_NO, ISSUE_WRTER, ISSUE_TITLE, ISSUE_CONTENT, ISSUE_IPCR_SE_CODE, ISSUE_REGDATE, PRJCT_SN) VALUES (ISSUE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{unit_job_sn}, #{mile_no}, (SELECT USER_SN FROM PROJECT_USER WHERE MBER_SN = #{mber_sn} and prjct_sn = #{prjct_sn}), #{issue_title}, #{issue_content}, #{issue_ipcr_se_code}, SYSDATE, #{prjct_sn})
mapper.select: SELECT MILE_NO, MILE_TITLE FROM MILESTONE WHERE mile_wrter IN (select user_sn from project_user where prjct_sn=#{prjct_sn}) and mile_state_code = '1'
select issue_sttus_code from issue a, project_user b where a.issue_wrter = b.user_sn and b.user_sn in (select user_sn from project_user where prjct_sn = #{prjct_sn})
select issue_sttus_code from issue a, project_user b where a.issue_wrter = b.user_sn and b.user_sn in (select user_sn from project_user where mber_sn = #{mber_sn})

SELECT A.ISSUE_SN, A.ISSUE_TITLE, A.ISSUE_REGDATE, A.ISSUE_STTUS_CODE, A.ISSUE_CONTENT, A.UNIT_JOB_SN, ( SELECT D.MILE_NO FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_NO, ( SELECT D.MILE_TITLE FROM MILESTONE D WHERE A.MILE_NO = D.MILE_NO ) AS MILE_TITLE, A.ISSUE_IPCR_SE_CODE, C.MBER_NCNM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ISSUE_REPLY WHERE ISSUE_SN = A.ISSUE_SN )AS REPLYCNT, A.PRJCT_SN, C.MBER_SN FROM ISSUE A, PROJECT_USER B, MEMBER C WHERE A.ISSUE_WRTER = B.USER_SN AND B.MBER_SN = C.MBER_SN
AND A.ISSUE_SN = #{issue_sn}
mapper.update: UPDATE ISSUE SET UNIT_JOB_SN = #{unit_job_sn}, MILE_NO = #{mile_no}, ISSUE_TITLE = #{issue_title}, ISSUE_CONTENT = #{issue_content}, ISSUE_IPCR_SE_CODE = #{issue_ipcr_se_code}, ISSUE_UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRJCT_SN = #{prjct_sn} AND ISSUE_SN = #{issue_sn}
